sentence.Network_en: Sinopec's $ 7.2 billion acquisition of Addax has a familiar ring to it.
sentence.Network_cn: 上述现象在中石化集团斥资72亿美元收购Addax这 件事上又重复了一遍.

sentence.Network_en: Addax also owns oil fields in Kurdistan.
sentence.Network_cn: Addax在库尔德斯坦也拥有油田.

sentence.Network_en: Including the Addax deal, Chinese oil firms have bought $ 43.7 billion of overseas assets since 2005.
sentence.Network_cn: 算上对Addax的收购, 中国的石油公司自2005年以来已经收购了437亿美元的海外资产.
